text: Óscar Andrés Rodríguez Maradiaga, S.D.B. (born 29 December 1942) is a Honduran Salesian and Cardinal of the Catholic Church. He is the current Archbishop of Tegucigalpa, is the former President of Caritas Internationalis and was President of the Latin American Episcopal Conference (CELAM) from 1995 to 1999. Rodríguez became a cardinal in 2001. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Honduran people
title: Óscar Rodríguez Maradiaga
